text: Mark James DeSaulnier (born March 31, 1952) is an American politician. He is a Democratic member of the United States House of Representatives. He became the representative for California's 11th congressional district on January 3, 2015. In 2015, DeSaulnier was diagnosed with leukemia. In May 2016, it was announced the leukemia was incurable and that DeSaulnier would still run for re-election in 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * *http://www.markdesaulnier.com Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:State legislators of the United States Category:People from Lowell, Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from California Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Mark DeSaulnier
